phrases: SERN will take the time machine.
You three are coming with me.
I will make her pay for this!
suujuuoku mono kodou no kazu sae
Even the world's billions of heartbeats
anata ni wa matataki teido no saji na toukyuu
Are nothing to you but a fleeting and insignificant question
kako ni torawarete mirai wo nageku mo
We may be trapped in the past or lament the future
chiri hitotsu gosan wo yurusanu hitsuzen
But predetermination does not allow the slightest mistake
mugen ni hirogaru yume mo egaku mirai mo
The infinite dreams and imagined futures before us
bokutachi ni yurusareta kyoei no genri
Are naught but vain theories we may hold
yuugen sore wa futatsu no hari ga shimesu
Finitude is what the two clock hands show
zankoku na yakujou to sentaku e
As they point toward a cruel destiny and choice
dakara i am about to ichibyou goto ni sekaisen wo koete
And now I cross the boundary between worlds each second
kimi no sono egao mamoritai no sa
Because I want to protect that smile of yours
soshite mata kanashimi no nai jikan no ruupu e to
And a loop in time without sadness will once again
Mayuri was still in elementary school
She went to the grave every day.
Even six months after her grandmother's death,
She always had her grandmother's pocket watch in her hand,
and she was always, always looking up at the sky.
Like she was waiting for her grandmother to come and get her.
And then one day, there was a ray of light.
It was the kind called Rembrandt Lighting,
It felt like the light was drawing her up.
Like she was going to disappear...
I will not let it take you.
You are going to be my hostage.
I will use you for human experiments.
The words that came out of my mouth
were from some show I would seen as a little kid.
Mayuri and I had watched it together.
Some mad scientist, screaming like an idiot...
So Mayushii is your hostage, right?
Then, I guess I cannot go, huh?
Just do not get the tropical special.
What is wrong with you, all of a sudden?
Mayushii said she was going to Miss Ruka's, to invite her to the party, remember?
We are done here for today.
Both of you, go home now!
His phone starts ringing, and then...
I cannot answer the phone right now!
If you would like to leave a message...
There is nothing to indicate that the world line changed.
It is different than the D-mail.
I really am back at 5:00 PM.
No, the bullet train is white.
After this, Mayuri will return with Suzuha.
Should I go to the police?
That I have come from the future?
She said she was going back to the lab.
It was so nice of you to invite me to the party, but...
Did she say she was stopping anywhere?
If you see her, tell her to call me right away!
If the world line has not changed,
then if I do not do anything different,
she should do the same things as last time.
Feyris cannot answer the phone right now.
I told you, we are done today.
You time leaped from the future, did not you?
The second you answered the phone, you seemed to change.
From the way you are acting,
I can guess that something happened.
But I do not have time to give you the details.
Just get away from the lab.
She just invited me to your party
I have to take Nae shopping...
And once you have taken her, do not come back!
But I asked Suzu-san to come, too,
You always do things I do not understand,
but today, I really do not understand you.
Did you really want to do the experiment, after all?
But just for now, can you listen to me?
I will explain the details later, I promise.
There are so many people here.
But no one's at the platform...
the following lines have been shut down, due to a bomb threat.
They said they do not know when the trains will start again.
Mayuri, get to the subway now!
What are you standing there for?
Run, as fast as you can!
Shiina Mayuri was the one who died.
I mean, Okabe Rintarou has been captured.
I will not let you kill her!
that Mr. Braun is planning to return tonight.
Okarin, did you do something again?
It is dangerous to be here.
We are done here for today.
It does not matter if I was acting weird.
For now, I just need them away from the lab!
I cannot answer the phone right now!
Why is it taking so long?
It is going to end up like last time!
Tell her not to move until I get there!
She said she was going back to the lab.
No, the bullet train is white.
I was about to go fix Fubuki-chan's costume,
and then go to the lab.
She said a thread on the costume I made came undone.
I just got a message from her.
Once it is fixed, I will go right to the lab,
so I will make it to the party.
So I wanted you to come with me for a bit.
I am sorry, but do it later.
Yeah, we are going to be away for a while.
I can put Fubuki-chan off till tomorrow,
We do not have much time to catch the train.
But Mayushii is not ready at all, and...
Is not Akihabara Station that way?
It is been a really long time
since you pulled me along like this.
There are so many people here.
A bomb threat was called in.
Mayushii has a lot of places she wants to go,
but it is okay for now.
when this is over, I want you to tell me everything.
I am sorry I cannot help you.
Let us have that party sometime.
I just wanted to surprise her...
I will not let you kill her!
kisei sareta chikai mujihi naru, juuni no shinri nogarerarenai
We cannot escape the 12 merciless truths and the controlled oath we took
If we wish for a tomorrow full of rest
te no naka no toutoi jishou no chihei he
to be given to the precious event horizon in our hands
toraware shi meiyaku arawareta gishou no rinkaku
the promise we made in captivity turns out to be a phantom
seimei no tenshi wa moumoku na jikan wo kizanda
The angel of life recorded a time of blindness
seimei no tenshi wa moumoku na jikan wo kizanda
The angel of life recorded a time of blindness
I will consecrate them to you
subete ga i am about to kakikaerareru
subete ga i am about to kakikaerareru
